Name: DarioOO
AboutMe:
My main focus are 3D programming (3d engines usage, 3d engine writing, shader programming, OpenGL), sotfware engineering & architecture, I'm proficient with Java (RMI), C# (Entity framework and Parallel paradigm), C and C++ (especially), PHP( and company), CMake. I can setup a working environment for C++ for cross-platform / multi-target development using Continuos Integration, I also did several videogames and released few libraries and frameworks. I also used several developing tools: Unity3D Adroid Studio, Visual Studio, Qt, Bison & Flex, shell scripting, GIT, SVN.

My experience (excluding the degree in computer science + additional exams) is mostly in opensource projects and indipendent startups (someone had Idea, I just joined some friends to help programming as learning experience). There are few frameworks and applications I can show, and some closed source games.

I'm totally untollerant to CSS.

I love carribean dance and walking in the countryside with friends or with my dog.
